modName: Audio overhaul for Skyrim 2 - Purity patches
summary: Various patches for Audio overhaul 2 and Purity.
descriptionHtml:
This patch is offering some all in one merged patches for AOS2 and Purity.

The final aim is to have those patches incorporated into the official patches of audio overhaul for Skyrim 2.

[b][color=#6aa84f]REQUIREMENTS:[/color]
[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773/?]Audio overhaul for Skyrim 2[/url] by Lord korn[/size]
[/list][/b][list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?][b]Purity[/b][/url] by Laast, any of those versions:[/size]
- 1.4- 1.6- 1.7- 1.8- 1.9[/list][size=2][color=#6aa84f]ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS (Optional):[/color]
[list]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28016/?]Expanded Snow System[/url] by Jonusl2d[/size]
[*][size=2]Sounds of Skyrim (all 3 plugins requiered)  by Cliffworms : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8601/?]Dungeons[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20193/?]Civilization[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10886/?]Wild[/url][/size]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?][size=2]True Storms[/size][/url][size=2] by fadingsignal[/size][/b]
[/list][/size]
[b][color=#6aa84f]INSTALLATION:[/color][/b]
Install with either Mod Organizer or the Nexus Mod Manager, follow the instructions.

Basically, the installer is an easy tool to help you put a merged patch of Purity + AOS + SOS  + ESS + TS.
Just follow the instruction on screen:
- Select if you are using both AOS and SOS
- Select if you are using ESS, TS or both of them on top of Purity 

[b][color=#6aa84f]LOAD ORDER:
[/color][/b][color=#e06666][optional][/color]ESS.esp
[color=#e06666][optional][/color]TS.esp
AOS.esp
Purity.esp
[color=#e06666][optional][/color]sosxxx.esp
[color=#e06666][select one][/color]purity_AOS_patch.esp
[color=#e06666][select one][/color]purity_AOS_ESS.esp 
[color=#e06666][select one][/color]purity_AOS_sos.esp
author: Various
